text: ‘‘niccayamaka nankal inta kur'anaiyum nampamattom; itarku munnulla vetankalaiyum nampavemattom'' enru (inta) nirakarippavarkal kurukinranar. Akave, ivvakkiramakkararkal tankal iraivanmun niruttappattu avarkalil cilar cilarai nintippataiyum; palavinamanavarkal karvam kontavarkalai nokki ‘‘ninkal illaiyenil niccayamaka nankal nampikkai konteyiruppom'' enru kuruvataiyum nir parppirayin (avarkalin ili nilaimaiyaik kantu kolvir)
